√rih 'lick'

present: [2.] réḍhi  rihánti etc.  rihaté  rihāṇá  ríhāṇa  rehāṇa  

perfect: ririhvā́ṅs  

verbal: rīḍha  

secondary: intensive: rérihat  rérihāṇa etc.  rerihyáte etc.  

derivatives: -réhaṇa  rerihá AV.  

The other verb-forms and derivatives made from √lih, which see.
